question: WHAT CAN I RECITE TO INSTILL LOVE BETWEEN MY WIFE AND MY MOTHER? THEREâ€™S GOT TO BE SOME HADITH ABOUT THIS, AS ISLAM ENCOURAGES JOINT FAMILIES (PARENTS AND KIDS).

The best way to create love between the wife and your mother is to encourage
one another to give gifts. Encourage them not to go by the book of rights.
Rather go by the book of love, Khidmat. Explain, encourage your wife to
treat your mother as her mother, overlook her shortcomings.

Similarly, with Hikmat and wisdom, convince your mother that your wife loves
her, cares for her and after all she is her daughter also. May Allah Ta'ala
grant them love, compassion and happiness, Aameen.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
